Dear Mr. Follows*
Mr. Goode11 has asked me to send my English
through Poetry pieces on to you, and I therefore onoloso
the new one, ©n E. A. Robinson's "Richard Cory."
I am most pleased with the tapes 1 have so
far heard, of the scripts prepared on the basis of
my little essays, I think w© have hit upon an
interesting technique of cooperation, and Mr, Goodellfg

Yours sincerely,
A/.
